metadata.title: CVE-2024-22368 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium
metadata.description: The Spreadsheet::ParseXLSX package before 0.28 for Perl can encounter anout-of-memory condition during parsing of a crafted XLSX document. Thisoccurs because the memoize implementation does not have appropriateconstraints on merged cells.

criterions.comment: libspreadsheet-parsexlsx-perl package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
